headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://*.googletagmanager.com https://*.google-analytics.com https://umami.itscattime.com; style-src 'self' fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://*.google-analytics.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.google-analytics.com; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; report-uri /csp-violation-report;
